Kansas_City.North Kansas City Hospital:
North Kansas City Hospital is an acute care hospital located in North Kansas City, Missouri at 2800 Clay Edwards Drive.


== Hospital Background ==
North Kansas City Hospital is a 451-licensed-bed and 72-acre (29 ha) campus containing the hospital itself, Health Services Pavilion encompassing patient rooms, outpatient services, offices for Hospital staff, physician offices and a conference center. Health Center North is the location for Home Health Services and NorthCare Hospice.
